description:
START THE GAME: THE MAIN MENU (A Wowie 2.0 Game Jam 2020)

A 2D Platformer game made for Wowie Game Jam 2020

WARNING!!! PRESS BACKSPACE 4 TIMES AT THE START OF THE GAME

WARNING: On some computers the game does not load properly the ground enemies and they don't damage the player (collision problem due to the slower managers managing the player, enemies and player status /one of them is still null after the game is started/, and no loading delay before the game starts). The game should start at  the exact moment when the enemy hits the player. If the enemy (the word QUIT is the enemy) won't do anything to the player (the word START is the player), you MUST press BACKSPACE once (minor puzzle spoiler: you actually need to press BACKSPACE 4 times to  reduce the player hitbox and squeeze through the gap). Sorry for the inconvenience (using the backspace detaching feature earlier in the game).

WARNING!!! PRESS BACKSPACE 4 TIMES AT THE START OF THE GAME

Ingame tips are displayed at the top of the screen!

Recommended key bindings: WASD/Space/Backspace/R/Left Shift/Enter

WASD - movement (you can use arrows as well)

Space - jump

Backspace - detach parts (you'll get an ingame tip between puzzle #2 and #3 for it, but you MUST use it at the beginning if the QUIT enemy won't change the player on hit)

R - reset part of the level (you don't need to use it at the beginning, you'll get an ingame tip later in the game)  

LEFT Shift - dash (it's a mid-game upgrade, you can't use it at the beginning; I forgot to add the right shift key) 

Enter - attack (can't use it in the beginning; early-mid game feature for the STA-phase of the player, you'll receive ingame tip) 

A+Enter (or left arrow + Enter) - attack to the left of the player (can't use it in the beginning) 

There are more key combinations, but you're going to read about them in the game. 

Mouse Click (to close the game on the Ending scene via clickable 2D object)

Player phases:

START - at the beginning of the game

STAR - can jump, can move

STA - can jump, can move, can ATTACK (for attacks to the left hold the left direction)

ST - can't jump, can move

S - can jump, can move, on 1 life/hit

GLITCHES

Credits: Wowie Resources - thank you for the great SFX

SPOILER!!! CHEAT MAP

Gameplay features: Double jumping, Dashing, Wall climbing, Wall jumping, Weird custom physics puzzle solving, Custom gravity modifying effectors, Falling platforms and objects, Jump pads, Hidden "bugs" used for intentional exploiting and puzzle solving, Fighting (or running from) different types of ground and aerial AIs (enemies)
